it.polimi.se2018.server.controller

Class ToolCardEffect

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.server.controller.ToolCardEffect

  • class ToolCardEffect
extends java.lang.Object
    Class ToolCardEffect: the class responsible of the different effect implemented by the tool card in the game

      • grozingPliersEffect

        void grozingPliersEffect(int id,
                         int indexPool,
                         int increase)
                  throws InvalidMoveException
        effect implemented by the grozing pliers tool card, set a new value to the dice depending on the choose made by the player in the match
        Parameters:
        id - of tha player
        indexPool - index of the dice in the card
        increase - increase or decrease decision by the player
        Throws:
        InvalidMoveException - if something goes wrong

      • moveOneDiceEffect

        void moveOneDiceEffect(int id,
                       int indexStart,
                       int indexEnd,
                       int number)
                throws InvalidMoveException
        method responsible of the effect of some tool cards that move a dice from an index of the pattern box list to another one
        Parameters:
        id - of the player
        indexStart - index where to take the dice
        indexEnd - index where to move it
        number - of the tool card on which the effect is running
        Throws:
        InvalidMoveException - if something goes wrong

                    int indexStart1,

        method responsible of the effect of a tool card to move two dice from a position to another in the pattern card
        Parameters:
        id - of the player
        indexStart1 - where to take the first dice
        indexEnd1 - where to move the first dice
        indexStart2 - where to take the second dice
        indexEnd2 - where to move the second dice

        InvalidMoveException - if something goes wrong

      • tapWheelEffect

        void tapWheelEffect(int id,
                    int numberOfDice,
                    int indexStart1,
                    int indexEnd1,
                    int indexStart2,
                    int indexEnd2)
             throws InvalidMoveException
        method responsible of the effect of moving up to two dice,depending on the chose of the player, in the pattern box list that match the color of a dice in the round tracker
        Parameters:
        id - of the player
        numberOfDice - to move up
        indexStart1 - index of the first dice to move
        indexEnd1 - index where to move the first dice
        indexStart2 - index of the second dice to move
        indexEnd2 - index where to move the second dice
        Throws:
        InvalidMoveException - if something goes wrong
